name: jekyll-bootstrap-theme
description: A basic but extensible Jekyll theme based on Bootstrap 5.

scripts.assets:clean: rm -rf assets/js && rm -rf _sass/bootstrap && rm -rf assets/css/fonts && rm -rf assets/css/bootstrap-icons.css
scripts.assets:install: yarn run assets:copy:js && yarn run assets:copy:scss && yarn run assets:copy:fonts && yarn run assets:copy:css
scripts.build: yarn run assets:install && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.serve: yarn run assets:install && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload

author: Jonah Aragon
